sub_title: Revitalizing marketing strategies for the hospitality industry
summary:
With more than eight years of experience in marketing for the hospitality industry, I have developed a solid expertise in digital marketing, including website management and OTAs, social media strategy, B2B partnerships development, as well as in marketing campaigns, graphic design, and public relations, all fuelled by a passion for customer service and the hotel industry.  
- Polyvalent professional with experience in all aspects of marketing
- Highly skilled communicator with a proven capability to deliver presentations and trainings 
- Bachelor of Commerce from McGill University, with a Major in Marketing, coupled with an eCornell Certificate in Hotel Management
- Multilingual proficiency in English, French, Italian (intermediate) and Spanish (basic)
